column4: can someone please tell me some basic ubuntu shortcuts (not link me), my mouse doesnt work :)
alt+f1 gets you to the gnome menu, alt+f2 allows you to execute a command... That's really all you need ;)
Alt F2 got me into virtual command window...
just unplug it, then run dmesg | tail -f, and then plug it back in and see what it says
